thread.title: 2018 Ford Expedition offers more of freaking everything - Roadshow
thread.title_full: 2018 Ford Expedition offers more of freaking everything - Roadshow

title: 2018 Ford Expedition offers more of freaking everything - Roadshow
text:
2018 Ford Expedition offers more of freaking everything 
Say hello to the 2018 Ford Expedition. Photo by: Ford Pricing is currently unavailable. 
Power comes by way of a 3.5-liter EcoBoost turbocharged V6, but Ford hasn't talked about output figures yet. Photo by: Ford Pricing is currently unavailable. 
But that's not what's important -- what's important is the amount of crap Ford shoved into this thing. Photo by: Ford Pricing is currently unavailable. 
The Expedition sports a number of new features, including wireless phone charging, a Wi-Fi hotspot that supports 10 devices up to 50 feet away from the car, four 12-volt outlets... Photo by: Ford Pricing is currently unavailable. 
... six USB chargers, a 110-volt power outlet, a two-row panoramic glass roof and an adjustable cargo shelf behind the third row. Photo by: Ford Pricing is currently unavailable. 
The second and third row can be folded flat with the push of a button, and the second-row seats can tilt forward to allow third-row access without removing a child seat. Photo by: Ford Pricing is currently unavailable. 
It'll pack 360 degrees of camera coverage, lane-keeping assist, adaptive cruise control with stop-and-go functionality, blind-spot monitoring and autonomous emergency braking that works up to 50 mph.
